    • Method Detail

      • updateGameView

        public void updateGameView(int[][] map,
                           int[] bomberMap,
                           int[] info,
                           int currentLevel,
                           int remainingTime,
                           int currentScore1,
                           int currentScore2,
                           boolean b)
        Updates the screen of the game.
        Parameters:
        map - map to draw.
        bomberMap - bombers to draw.
        info - information to draw.
        currentLevel - current level information.
        remainingTime - remaining time information.
        currentScore1 - current score for player1.
        currentScore2 - current score for player2.
        b - two or one player game.

        Parameters:

        result - win or lose.
